pr_title: [fr] add rule être + de + verbe à l'infinitif

timeline.message: [fr] add rule être + de + verbe à l'infinitif
[fr] add rule être + de + verbe à l'infinitif

timeline.bodyText: Please, add here default="temp_off" in new rules, so they can be checked with a corpus before being enabled.
timeline.author: jaumeortola
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -32208,6 +32208,19 @@ though, and has since been slightly modified)-->
       <example><marker>savoir gré</marker></example>
       <example>Le contrat est négocié de gré à gré.</example>
     </rule>
+    <rule id="ETRE_DE_VERBE" name="être de + verbe inf">

replies.bodyText:
Ok i will remember.
How can i check with a french corpus in development ?
replies.author: thelittlefireman

replies.bodyText:
You can check rules here (before committing): https://community.languagetool.org/ruleEditor/expert
You can add "?devMode=true" to get even more results.
After committing, there are daily tests that check for differences. If you want to see these differences, you can be added to a developer mailing list by @danielnaber.
replies.author: jaumeortola
